TopicTitle: 0.22 Release Date Confirmed for October 16th,2013,3rd Millenia,C.E.

Articles.Content: So, any news on what's in .23? When will it be released?

*server proceeds to crash*

Sorry to be pessimistic, but this happens each time. But it is weird for them to release a release date... But anyway, Excited for .22
So, any news on what's in .23? When will it be released?
I'm going to punch your face... IN THE FACE!
Hey! On my birthday!

Hey! On my birthday!

Talk about one hell of a birthday present.
Awesome I Can't wait!

Hey! On my birthday!

Hah my birthday is tomorrow as well , best birthday present ever!

My workweek just ended. I got tomorrow and the day after off. HAH! And here I was, wondering if I had anything interesting to do.

I'm thinking new "An Exercise In Absurdity".

They announced a... RELEASE DATE? Guys, something is clearly wrong here. This does not happen, this CANNOT happen.

I feel something is wrong swell.... On all this time .. Since 0.14 or 0.15 I can not remember a single time they announced a update like this...

I have 2 theory..

1.- they want to test the new updater / Server to see if we manage to make it crash again.

2.- they are trolling.

I think they are trolling..

I feel something is wrong swell.... On all this time .. Since 0.14 or 0.15 I can not remember a single time they announced a update like this...

I have 2 theory..

1.- they want to test the new updater / Server to see if we manage to make it crash again.

2.- they are trolling.

I think they are trolling..

Can you imagine how many people they are going to make push "F5" every second (or more)?

Yush! I'm so exited!

I've quit KSP for a while, due to repetitiveness. But still kept an eye on it. This update is exactly what I need to get back into it!

I need to call my mom and tell her.
I hate being the killjoy but I doubt it's going to come out at midnight 10/16. Though I'd really love to be proven wrong. :C

Can you imagine how many people they are going to make push "F5" every second (or more)?

cant read, im spamming F5..

Happy birthday for me!!!

--- Wait I'm like the 3rd KSP fan born on the 16th, weird...

Happy birthday for me!!!

--- Wait I'm like the 3rd KSP fan born on the 16th, weird...

You three must be the human universe's parallel of Jeb, Bill, and Bob; the stars are our fate, you must come together and show the unenlightened

It's almost as if there's some significance to that date, like it were a sort of junction point of the entire space-time continuum!

Either that, or it could just be a remarkable coincidence.

Little-known fact: In a a group of 23 people, the chance of two having a birthday on the same day is about 50%. In a group of 57, it's 99%. You really shouldn't be shocked if people have the same birthday as you; particularly in a community as active as this one.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birthday_problem
omg can't sleep -.-
I'm tempted to wait until the hot fix 0.22.1 to down load, if it is released tomorrow.
Steam server crash in 19 minutes.....even if they don't release it right at midnight lol

Steam server crash in 19 minutes.....even if they don't release it right at midnight lol

the 16th at SQUAD, when ever that may be cuz I do not know where exactly they are and what time zone they are in. for me, the 16th is 1 hour 15 minutes out as of this post lol
Who needs the label on their F5 key anyway. I think there will be a lot of blank F5 keys in 15 minutes

I will play.

And not sleep.

for days.
